description:
Docker has become a fundamental tool for enterprise, developers, IT administrators, and hobbyists alike.  *We partnered up with Docker Inc.* to bring this video talking about why it's such a great tool, who it's useful for, and highlight some features you may not be using.

Full Docker Guide: https://techhut.tv/7-docker-basics-for-beginners/
Learn more about Docker Scout: https://dockr.ly/4ceMO2I
Download Docker Desktop: https://dockr.ly/4efYxjh
